decision_conditions: Due to the excessive scale and depth of the extension combined with the proposed finishing materials, the proposed development would constitute an incongruous addition that would not relate well to the host property or the immediate surrounding area, thereby conflicting with Policy DM10 of the Kingston Core Strategy (2012) and Policy Guidance 33 of the Residential Design SPD (2013).

The excessive depth and height of the proposed extension, combined with its siting along the shared boundary would have an overbearing appearance and result in an undue sense of enclosure to adjoining property, No. 171 Elm Road. The applicant has also failed to demonstrate that the proposed development would not have an unacceptable adverse impact on light/sunlight to the nearest ground floor habitable room at No. 171Elm Road. The proposal is therefore contrary to policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
description: Demolition of existing conservatory and erection of single storey rear/side extension
